verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David בִּ֝הְיוֹת֗וֹ <S%H1961><s%> was in בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> when he was in the wilderness יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> O God אֵלִ֥י <S%H410><s%> thou [art] my God אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> I אֲ‍ֽשַׁחֲ֫רֶ֥ךָּ <S%H7836><s%> early will I seek צָמְאָ֬ה <S%H6770><s%> thirsteth לְךָ֨ ׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> thee my soul כָּמַ֣הּ <S%H3642><s%> longeth לְךָ֣ בְשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> for thee my flesh בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> land צִיָּ֖ה <S%H6723><s%> for thee in a dry וְעָיֵ֣ף <S%H5889><s%> and thirsty בְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> where no מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thee in the sanctuary חֲזִיתִ֑יךָ <S%H2372><s%> so [as] I have seen לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> To see עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> thy power וּכְבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> and thy glory

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] better חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> Because thy lovingkindness מֵֽחַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> than life שְׂפָתַ֥י <S%H8193><s%> my lips יְשַׁבְּחֽוּנְךָ׃ <S%H7623><s%> shall praise

כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So אֲבָרֶכְךָ֣ <S%H1288><s%> Thus will I bless בְחַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> thee while I live בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> in thy name אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> I will lift up כַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> my hands

כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> with חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> as [with] marrow וָ֭דֶשֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> and fatness תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> My soul וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> lips רְ֝נָנ֗וֹת <S%H7445><s%> [thee] with joyful יְהַלֶּל־ <S%H1984><s%> shall praise פִּֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> and my mouth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> When זְכַרְתִּ֥יךָ <S%H2142><s%> When I remember עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְצוּעָ֑י <S%H3326><s%> thee upon my bed בְּ֝אַשְׁמֻר֗וֹת <S%H821><s%> on thee in the [night] watches אֶהְגֶּה־ <S%H1897><s%> [and] meditate בָּֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been עֶזְרָ֣תָה <S%H5833><s%> Because thou hast been my help לִּ֑י וּבְצֵ֖ל <S%H6738><s%> therefore in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <S%H3671><s%> of thy wings אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <S%H7442><s%> will I rejoice
דָּבְקָ֣ה <S%H1692><s%> followeth hard נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> My soul אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <S%H310><s%> after בִּ֝֗י תָּמְכָ֥ה <S%H8551><s%> upholdeth יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> thee thy right hand

וְהֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those לְ֭שׁוֹאָה <S%H7722><s%> to destroy יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> But those [that] seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> [it] shall go בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H8482><s%> into the lower parts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

יַגִּירֻ֥הוּ <S%H5064><s%> They shall fall עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְדֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> the power חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword מְנָ֖ת <S%H4521><s%> they shall be a portion שֻׁעָלִ֣ים <S%H7776><s%> for foxes יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> But the king יִשְׂמַ֪ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice בֵּאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> in God יִ֭תְהַלֵּל <S%H1984><s%> by him shall glory כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone הַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> every one that sweareth בּ֑וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יִ֝סָּכֵ֗ר <S%H5534><s%> shall be stopped פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> but the mouth דֽוֹבְרֵי־ <S%H1696><s%> of them that speak שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> lies
